mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO AS "userNo", OATH_CD AS "oathCd", USER_NM AS "userNm", OATH_ID AS "oathId", EMAIL AS "email", MOBILE AS "mobile", RGTR_NO AS "rgtrNo", MDFR_NO AS "mdfrNo", TO_CHAR(REG_YMD, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS "regDttm", TO_CHAR(REG_YMD, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS "regDate", TO_CHAR(MDFCN_YMD, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS "mdfDttm", TO_CHAR(MDFCN_YMD, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS "mdfDate" FROM TMP_OAUTH WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND OATH_CD = #{oathCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TMP_OAUTH ( USER_NO, OATH_CD, USER_NM, OATH_ID, EMAIL, MOBILE, RGTR_NO, REG_YMD ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{oathCd}, #{userNm}, #{oathId}, #{email}, #{mobile}, #{gsUserNo}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE TMP_OAUTH SET MDFR_NO = #{gsUserNo}, USER_NM = #{userNm}, OATH_ID = #{oathId}, EMAIL = #{email }, MOBILE = #{mobile}, MDFCN_YMD = NOW() WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND OATH_CD = #{oathCd}
